mapper.select: SELECT A.SPO_CO_NO, A.SPO_REVIEW_NO, A.COMM_CONTENT, A.COMM_CREATE_DATE, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORDER, A.USER_NO, A.ID, A.NICKNAME, A.GENDER FROM (SELECT F.SPO_CO_NO, F.SPO_REVIEW_NO, F.COMM_CONTENT, F.COMM_CREATE_DATE, F.STATE, F.DEPTH, F.GROUP_NO, F.GROUP_ORDER, F.USER_NO, U.ID, U.NICKNAME, U.GENDER FROM SPO_COMMENT F INNER JOIN USERS U ON F.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) A WHERE SPO_REVIEW_NO = #{spoReviewNo} ORDER BY A.SPO_CO_NO
